intension: Create a business card for a travel agency that offers vacation planning services. The design features a red suitcase to represent travel. The contact information includes phone number +123-456-7890 and website www.yourwebsite.com.
globalcaption: The image features a red suitcase with a globe on top of it, symbolizing travel. The suitcase is positioned in the center of the image, and the globe is placed on top of it. The suitcase is surrounded by several airplanes, with one airplane on the left side, another on the right side, and two more airplanes in the background. The scene conveys a sense of travel and adventure.
keywords: travel, vacation, tourism, journey, trip, tour, leisure, voyage, travelling, red, suitcase, luggage, illustration, service, contacts, information, business card

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a red suitcase with a globe on top of it, symbolizing travel. The suitcase is positioned in the center of the image, and the globe is placed on top of it. Above the suitcase, there are three airplanes flying in the sky, indicating a journey or travel. The scene is set against a red background, which adds to the vibrant and lively atmosphere of the image
